title: GENBoostGPU: GPU-accelerated elastic net boosting for large-scale epigenomics
description: GENBoostGPU provides a scalable framework for running elastic net regression with boosting across thousands of CpG sites, leveraging GPU acceleration with RAPIDS cuML, CuPy, and cuDF. It supports SNP preprocessing, cis-window filtering, LD clumping, missing data imputation, and phenotype integration â€” all optimized for large-scale epigenomics.
